OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour day 1 bryostatin 1 IV 24 hour day 2 weekly 2 week . Courses repeat every 28 day absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Quality life assess baseline , course 1 2 , every 2 course thereafter .
